activities: Visier's product, Visier Workforce Analytics, is an analytic application designed for HR professionals and business leaders. Delivered through the Cloud, the Visier solution includes services to integrate workforce and business data, and the best-practice insights and analytics to improve organization workforce performance. Visier provides the core metrics, related sub-metrics, visual analytics to view corporate data. Part of the PII data might be required for these metrics calculations. Note that Visier only acts as an agent of corporate customers to analyze their employees' data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: customers' on-line data, customers' offline data, manually processed data
